---
title: Creating a Blog Post
description: This is an example of how to create a new blog post.
date: 2023-06-29
author: Caleb Grant
categories: [Quarto, Blog, Example]
---

To add a post, create a copy of `blog/posts/_template`, modify the folder name with the title of the post, then update the `index.qmd` with your content. New posts under `blog/posts` will show up in the [blog listings](/blog/index.qmd) when the site is rendered.
